test-case.name: op-date-equal2args-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-date-equal2args-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:07 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:date-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:date(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:date(lower bound) *******************************************************
